  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120225</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120225</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Z vzmetjo povezana vozička</string>
            <string language="en">Two carts connected by a spring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Karren angeschlossen bis zum einem 
Frühling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux chariots reliés par un ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois carros conectados por uma mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due carrelli collegati entro una molla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο κάρρα που συνδέονται με ένα ελατήριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos carros conectados por un resorte</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vozička na progi brez trenja sta spojena s stisnjeno vzmetjo, ki jo sprožimo.</string>
            <string language="en">Two carts on a track without friction are connected with compressed spring which is released.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzmet</string>
            <string language="en">spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Karren auf einer Spur ohne Friktion werden 
mit komprimiertem Frühling angeschlossen, der freigegeben wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux chariots sur une piste sans frottement sont 
reliés au ressort comprimé qui est libéré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois carros em uma trilha sem fricção são 
conectados com a mola comprimida que é liberada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due carrelli su una pista senza attrito sono 
collegati con la molla appiattita che è liberata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο κάρρα σε μια διαδρομή χωρίς τριβή συνδέονται με 
το συμπιεσμένο ελατήριο που εκδίδεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos carros en una pista sin la fricción están 
conectados con el resorte comprimido que release/versión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ressort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
